    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(double[] x,
                   double y,
                   double alpha)
        A LogisticClassifier uses the logistic update rule (AIMA Eq. 18.8): w_i \leftarrow w_i+\alpha(y-h_w(x)) \times h_w(x)(1-h_w(x)) \times x_i
        Specified by:
        update in class LinearClassifier

      • threshold

        public double threshold(double z)
        A LogisticClassifier uses a 0/1 sigmoid threshold at z=0.
        Specified by:
        threshold in class LinearClassifier
